{{title|1= operator=={{small|(ranges::zip_transform_view::''sentinel'')}}}}
{{cpp/ranges/zip_transform_view/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++23|1=
template&lt; bool OtherConst &gt;
    requires std::sentinel_for&lt;/*zentinel*/&lt;Const&gt;, /*ziperator*/&lt;OtherConst&gt;&gt;
friend constexpr bool operator==( const /*iterator*/&lt;OtherConst&gt;&amp; x,
                                  const /*sentinel*/&amp; y );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Compares the underlying iterator of {{c|x}} with the underlying sentinel of {{c|y}}.

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{tt|zip_transform_view::''sentinel''}}|tmpl=yes}}

{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|x|[[cpp/ranges/zip_transform_view#Nested classes|iterator]] to compare}}
{{par|y|[[cpp/ranges/zip_transform_view#Nested classes|sentinel]] to compare}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|1= x.inner_ == y.inner_}}, where {{tti|inner_}} denotes the underlying iterator or sentinel respectively.
